[Page Title: D'Allesandro's Pizza]

Search this site
Embedded Files Skip to main content Skip to navigation 
Order Now

Catering/Large Orders
Neighborhood-Style Pizza in Charleston, Summerville and Greenville SC At D'Allesandro's Pizza, we take pride in serving the best neighborhood-style pizza in Charleston, Summerville and Greenville SC . Since 2006, our family-operated business has been handcrafting delicious pizzas using local ingredients. With our hand-tossed crust and mouthwatering toppings, every bite is a taste sensation. Whether you prefer delivery, pickup, or dining in, we've got you covered. Plus, we offer a 10 percent military discount every day to show our appreciation. Experience the authentic flavors with our handmade pizza. Contact us now to place your order or stop by our restaurant for a slice of pure pizza perfection. Our Products Hand-Tossed Pizza Signature Pizza Calzones Stromboli Garlic Bread Salad Meatballs Sandwiches Wings Catering D'AL'S Merch Our shirts are available online!
